name: Ball Busters
description:
Block the balls With Your paddle but don't get hit!

V1.0: Initial release.

V1.1: Fixed break timer going up from 0 instead of down from 10.

V2.0: Made ball spawn speed increase after breaks and added dual paddle mode.

V3.0: Added paddle skins.

V4.0: Changed player collider.

V5.0: Changed music.

Music made by TeknoAXE.

Note: this game requires an HTC Vive

Please leave feedback as this is the first game I've ever made in unity!
